constituent: ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow
heisigStory: Drop of . . . brains . . . human legs . . . elbow.
koohiiStory1: 鬼(おに) is not a ghost. An ogre or a troll would be a more fitting translation. Such a thing has but a drop of brains and uses its legs and elbows as deadly weapons (a concept which should be familiar from the license (#765) to kill). I'll use "ogre" for this.
koohiiStory2: A ghost, or oni, wandering slowly on its human legs, searching for brains to eat. What looks like an elbow here is actually a pictoral representation of the forked tail protruding out of its rear.
